Package controllers

Class BTOProjectCTRL

java.lang.Object
controllers.BTOProjectCTRL
public class BTOProjectCTRL extends Object
Controller class for managing BTO projects in the BTO system.

Handles project creation, editing, deletion, filtering, and visibility updates. Provides role-based project menus and supports applicant, officer, and manager flows.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    BTOProjectCTRL(User currentUser)
    Constructs a BTOProjectCTRL for the given user and loads project data.

  • Method Details

    • runProjectMenu

      public void runProjectMenu(Scanner sc, UserCTRL userCTRL, BTOProjectCTRL projectCTRL, BTOProjectView projectView, BTOApplicationCTRL applicationCTRL, OfficerApplicationCTRL officerAppCTRL, OfficerApplicationView officerAppView, EnquiryView enquiryView, EnquiryCTRL enquiryCTRL, BTOApplicationView btoApplicationView)
      Runs the project menu for the current user, displaying options and routing to the appropriate actions based on the user's role (applicant, officer, manager).
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input.
      userCTRL - The UserCTRL instance.
      projectCTRL - This BTOProjectCTRL instance.
      projectView - The BTOProjectView for displaying menus and results.
      applicationCTRL - The BTOApplicationCTRL for handling applications.
      officerAppCTRL - The OfficerApplicationCTRL for officer applications.
      officerAppView - The OfficerApplicationView for officer application UI.
      enquiryView - The EnquiryView for enquiry UI.
      enquiryCTRL - The EnquiryCTRL for handling enquiries.

    • getProjectById

      public BTOProject getProjectById(int id)
      For manager: get any project by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The project ID.
      Returns:
      The BTOProject with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getNextProjectID

      public int getNextProjectID()
      Returns the next available project ID (max existing ID + 1).
      Returns:
      The next project ID.

    • createProject

      public void createProject(BTOProject p)
      Creates a new BTO project and persists it.
      Parameters:
      p - The new BTOProject to add.

    • editProject

      public boolean editProject(int projectId, BTOProject updated)
      Edits an existing project by replacing its fields with those from the updated object. Only managers can edit projects.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to edit.
      updated - The updated BTOProject object.
      Returns:
      true if the project was updated, false otherwise.

    • getProjectById

      public BTOProject getProjectById(List<BTOProject> projects, int id)

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(int projectId)
      Deletes a project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the project was deleted, false otherwise.

    • getFilteredProjects

      public List<BTOProject> getFilteredProjects()
      Filters projects based on the current user's role and eligibility. Applicants and HDB Officers see only visible and eligible projects. Managers see only projects they manage.
      Returns:
      List of filtered BTOProject objects.

    • getAllProjects

      public List<BTOProject> getAllProjects()
      Returns a copy of all BTO projects.
      Returns:
      List of all BTOProject objects.

    • getHandledProjects

      public List<BTOProject> getHandledProjects()
      Returns a list of BTO projects handled by the current officer (approved officer).
      Returns:
      List of handled BTOProject objects.

    • getFilteredProjectsForUser

      public List<BTOProject> getFilteredProjectsForUser(User user)
      Returns a list of projects filtered by both eligibility and the user's custom filter settings.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose filter settings to apply.
      Returns:
      List of filtered BTOProject objects.

    • updateUserFilterSettings

      public void updateUserFilterSettings(User user, FilterSettings fs)
      Saves new filter settings back to the user record and CSV.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose filter settings are to be updated.
      fs - The new FilterSettings.

    • updateProjectVisibility

      public void updateProjectVisibility()
      The `updateProjectVisibility` method parses project dates, checks if the current date is within the project application period, and updates project visibility accordingly before saving the changes to a CSV file.

    • saveProjects

      public void saveProjects()
      Persists the current list of projects to the CSV file.

    • getEligibleProjectsForOfficerApplication

      public List<BTOProject> getEligibleProjectsForOfficerApplication(String officerNRIC, MaritalState ms, int age)
      Returns a list of projects the officer is eligible to apply for as an officer, based on NRIC, marital status, and age.
      Parameters:
      officerNRIC - The NRIC of the officer.
      ms - The marital status of the officer.
      age - The age of the officer.
      Returns:
      List of eligible BTOProject objects.
